review: I wanted this to work so badly. However after many attempts, after refreshing our wifi, using the extender, resetting the stick, it never once would connect to our wifi. Had to return.
author: Jeanne M.

review: I give it 5 stars...it exceeded my expectations.I love it!
author: shakita rimson

review: Died within 6 months.  Customer support is awful.  Overall just a very "clunky" product.
author: Anonymous

review: I love that it can handle emulation of older game systems, which is what prompted me to buy one and replace one ofy Chromecasts with it. Unfortunately there is a noticeable lag when using Bluetooth controllers.My biggest problem though is how weak the WiFi reception is on the thing. My Chromecast plugged into the exact same HDMI port could handle streaming a videogame from my gaming pc at 720P@30FPS flawlessly. The fire stick in the exact same HDMI port can barely get signal on 2.4 or 5ghz. I sometimes resort to putting my phone into hotspot mode and connecting to the internet with it(thank goodness for unlimited data).
author: Michelle E. Bailey

review: The fire stick is an awesome item.....
author: Erskine Gordon

review: Great Great purchase. Absolutely love it!!!
author: Ricky King
